item.description:
@tL wrote:

I’ll go with option one, someone decided to either prune the sections without telling anyone or is deliberatly deleting everything. Though it has to be an admin due to the fact they were cleared instantly and only an admin has access to that sort of feature, anyway we’ll just have to wait for another admin to check the moderation logs.
